sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 06, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3842 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 10, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -2.44% decrease from the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $42.91, the dividend yield is 3.58%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $42.91, representing a -6.7% decrease from the 52 week high of $45.99 and a 14.73% increase over the 52 week low of $37.40.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 3.52%, compared to an industry average of 3.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
